original: Araṇaṁ sekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.

original: Araṇaṁ asekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naasekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.

original: Araṇaṁ nevasekkhanāsekkhaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nanevasekkhanāsekkho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
